title: Challenge your friends and find new routes & segments with Strava’s latest app update
content:
On top of tracking your rides, one of Strava’s most iconic features is the virtual leaderboard. Complete a segment with the fastest time and you become the KOM or QOM – King or Queen of the mountain. But what if you’d rather just compete with your friends rather than the entire cycling public? With Strava’s […]

The post Challenge your friends and find new routes & segments with Strava’s latest app update appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
